author: mturk
msg: Do not abort the connection if request is invalid, so that client receives
apache http error code, instead just dropping connection.

author: mturk
msg: In case ajp13 worker returns client error do not mark the worker
in error state. This operation is not recoverable, so return BAD_REQUEST

author: mturk
msg: In case there is an error in marshaling initial data return that as client

author: mturk
msg: Add BAD_REQUEST http status code define
